when I regain consciousness, I just realized I'm in hospital.
"Winne! Are you all right? Did you know what happen?" said Carrie
"Winne? I'm afraid there a terrible misunderstanding between us." I said
I pick up my phone and turn on my front camera. What!? My face has turned to another face which is my Vendetta, President Xi.

replies.msg:
I think to myself, stay cool, this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, isn't it?
Fortunately, even though I've changed my face, my six-pack abs and muscles still exist.

"Why are you chuckling? Winne, What's the matter?" said Carrie
